name: Аlien cat 4
description:
Alien cat 4 is a side-scrolling shooter. The game takes place in a nearby galaxy where a fighter with intergalactic evil in the form of a black cat has settled down. The player is assigned the role of a pilot of one of the warring parties. You will take part in a series of aerial conflicts. You will be waiting for dangerous air battles, the task is very simple to stop the invaders and restore justice. The game has a system of improvements and various bonuses, picking them up from the dead ships, you can pump your standard weapons from a simple machine gun to a rocket launcher.

Features:
-Scroll-shooter with a side view
- Pixel graphics
-- Harmonious sound
- Exciting battles
-Bosses
